metadata.name: HokagePiggy
metadata.description:
此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署计划的第三步：登陆 HECO。乘 DeFi 之疾风，星火终可燎原。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“风之自由，火之意志”状态。
This card is issued to commemorate the third step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: HECO. 
With the strong wind generated by DeFi, a single spark can start a huge blaze.
Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Freedom of Wind, Will of Fire".
总量(Amount)：198 
品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
